articles.title: Palantir shares fall 3% on lower-than-expected guidance - CNBC
articles.description: Defense-tech and AI firm Palantir reported earnings that beat analyst expectations on revenue, but also issued weaker-than-hoped for full-year guidance.
articles.content:
Palantir shares fell as much as 7% in Monday extended trading, before paring back earlier losses, after the defense tech firm reported weaker-than-expected guidance.
